artifacts.name: Resolution of Sojourner
artifacts.fourpiece: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

artifacts.name: Brave Heart
artifacts.fourpiece: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

artifacts.name: Defender's Will
artifacts.fourpiece: For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.

artifacts.name: Tiny Miracle
artifacts.fourpiece: Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

artifacts.name: Berserker
artifacts.fourpiece: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

artifacts.name: Martial Artist
artifacts.fourpiece: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

artifacts.name: Instructor
artifacts.fourpiece: Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

artifacts.name: Gambler
artifacts.fourpiece: Defeating an opponent has a 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

artifacts.name: The Exile
artifacts.fourpiece: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

artifacts.name: Adventurer
artifacts.fourpiece: Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

artifacts.name: Lucky Dog
artifacts.fourpiece: Picking up Mora restores 300 HP.

artifacts.name: Scholar
artifacts.fourpiece: Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.

artifacts.name: Traveling Doctor
artifacts.fourpiece: Using Elemental Burst restores 20% HP.

artifacts.name: Blizzard Strayer
artifacts.fourpiece: When a character attacks an opponent affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the opponent is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

artifacts.name: Thundersoother
artifacts.fourpiece: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Electro by 35%.

artifacts.name: Lavawalker
artifacts.fourpiece: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro by 35%.

artifacts.name: Maiden Beloved
artifacts.fourpiece: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

artifacts.name: Gladiator's Finale
artifacts.fourpiece: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

artifacts.name: Viridescent Venerer
artifacts.fourpiece: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

artifacts.name: Wanderer's Troupe
artifacts.fourpiece: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or a Bow.

artifacts.name: Thundering Fury
artifacts.fourpiece: Increases DMG caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, Superconduct, and Hyperbloom by 40%, and the DMG Bonus conferred by Aggravate is increased by 20%. When Quicken or the aforementioned Elemental Reactions are triggered, Elemental Skill CD is decreased by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

artifacts.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
artifacts.fourpiece: Increases Overloaded, Burning, and Burgeon DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

artifacts.name: Noblesse Oblige
artifacts.fourpiece: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

artifacts.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
artifacts.fourpiece: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.
